items.title: Highland Park shooter sentenced to life in prison for killing 7, injuring dozens
items.description: Crimo was sentenced to seven consecutive life sentences on Thursday for killing seven people and injuring dozens in the July 4, 2022, mass shooting.

items.title: 'Vladimir, STOP!' Trump says after deadliest Russian strike on Kyiv in months
items.description: Russian attack drones and ballistic missiles struck the capital, according to the Kyiv City Military Administration.

items.title: Judge issues temporary order to keep detained Columbia student in Vermont
items.description: Mohsen Mahdawi was arrested by ICE during a citizenship interview last week.

items.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump calls Harvard 'threat to democracy'
items.description: President Donald Trump called Harvard a "threat to democracy" as the university continues to defy the administration's demands regarding campus polici...

items.title: WATCH:  Woodpecker wreaks havoc in Massachusetts neighborhood
items.description: Residents of tranquil Rockport, Massachusetts, were in search of a menace who was leaving car windows cracked. Turns out it was a pileated woodpecker.
